title: Career Impact
content: Graduates of the Applied Bachelor's in Automotive Engineering Technology program have promising career opportunities in the automotive sector, including in vehicle manufacturing industries, vehicle maintenance and repair companies, and as automotive technology consultants. With skills in design, technological innovation, and engineering management, graduates can contribute to the development of environmentally friendly vehicles, automation, and future mobility solutions. Their competencies also open opportunities to pursue careers as researchers or developers in multinational companies, supporting the advancement of Indonesia's automotive industry on a global scale.
